mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_violation (product_id, violation_type, description, evidence_urls, punishment_result, credit_score_change, status) VALUES (#{violation.productId}, #{violation.violationType}, #{violation.description}, #{violation.evidenceUrls}, #{violation.punishmentResult}, #{violation.creditScoreChange}, #{violation.status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, product_id, violation_type, description, evidence_urls, punishment_result, credit_score_change, status FROM product_violation WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND status = 'active'
